title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 642 - Imposition Of Taxes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 642 - Imposition Of Taxes

State Regulations
§ 642.1 - Imposition of the basic tax
§ 642.2 - Imposition of the additional tax
§ 642.3 - Imposition of the special additional tax
§ 642.4 - Imposition of the City of New York tax
§ 642.5 - Imposition of the City of Yonkers tax
§ 642.6 - Imposition of the Broome County tax
§ 642.7 - Examples of calculations of the mortgage recording taxes

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 642

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §171; art. 11; Administrative

Code of the City of New York; Code of the City of Yonkers; Broome County Local

Law

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
